Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
      • com.xebisco.yield.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior, Disposable, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EquilateralTriangle, Oval, TextureRectangle
    public class Rectangle
extends ComponentBehavior
    It's a behavior that draws a rectangle

        public RectangleAnchor getAnchor()
        This function returns the start drawing anchor of a rectangle. If its Â´DOWNÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the top point. If its Â´UPÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the bottom point. If its Â´CENTERÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the center point. If its Â´LEFTÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the right point. If its Â´DOWNÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the left point.

      • setAnchor

        public void setAnchor​(RectangleAnchor anchor)
        This function sets the anchor of a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        anchor - The parameter "anchor" is of type RectangleAnchor, which is an enumerated type that represents the position of an anchor point relative to a rectangle. If its Â´DOWNÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the top point. If its Â´UPÂ´, The rectangle will have its center on the bottom point.         public void setOffset​(Vector2D offset)
        This function sets the offset of a Vector2D object.
        Parameters:
        offset - The "offset" parameter is a Vector2D object that represents the amount of displacement or shift in position from a reference point. This method sets the value of the "offset" instance variable to the value of the "offset" parameter passed to it.
